title: OpenShift开服失败？
author: undefined
txt_content:
[08:15:43] [Server thread/INFO]: Starting minecraft server version 1.8.3
[08:15:43] [Server thread/WARN]: To start the server with more ram, launch it as "java -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar minecraft_server.jar"
[08:15:43] [Server thread/INFO]: Loading properties
[08:15:43] [Server thread/INFO]: Default game type: SURVIVAL
[08:15:43] [Server thread/INFO]: Generating keypair
[08:15:43] [Server thread/INFO]: Starting Minecraft server on 127.9.69.1:8080
[08:15:43] [Server thread/INFO]: Using default channel type
[08:15:43] [Server thread/WARN]: **** FAILED TO BIND TO PORT!
[08:15:43] [Server thread/WARN]: The exception was: java.net.BindException: Address already in use
[08:15:43] [Server thread/WARN]: Perhaps a server is already running on that port?
[08:15:43] [Server thread/INFO]: Stopping server
[08:15:43] [Server Shutdown Thread/INFO]: Stopping server复制代码难道是端口问题吗，端口是8080

replies.author: SkyCatcher
replies.txt_content: 端口被占用了，在server.properties里面换个端口号

replies.author: 丨龙少丨
replies.txt_content: 怎么个情况啊？你是不是服务器到期了？还是FTPmods里面的MOD与客户端里面的MOD不匹配？还是你的服务器是新的，装的地图不匹配？请具体说明一下！还有实在不行加我QQ695478174

replies.author: undefined
replies.txt_content:
丨龙少丨 发表于 2015-3-14 06:38
怎么个情况啊？你是不是服务器到期了？还是FTPmods里面的MOD与客户端里面的MOD不匹配？还是你的服务器是新 ...
估计是误操作导致的，8080被占用

replies.author: undefined
replies.txt_content:
SkyCatcher 发表于 2015-3-14 00:39
端口被占用了，在server.properties里面换个端口号
哦，知道了，
